title: MathArtStream 7 ~ Dementors, Animagus and Episodic Memory: an Active Inference exploration (part 2)
description:
Dementors, Animagus and Episodic Memory: an Active Inference exploration of Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban Part II
Shanna Dobson, Héctor Manrique
This talk is a continuation of our MathArt Stream 6 https://www.youtube.com/live/qDilepcGCNs . We take a closer look at Animagus, autopoiesis, and morphogenesis, from the perspective of active inference and, internally, from higher category theory. 

Active Inference Institute information: 
Website: https://activeinference.org/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InferenceActive 
Discord: https://discord.activeinference.institute/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ActiveInference/ 
Active Inference Livestreams: https://video.activeinference.institute/
